entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Risk of freezing drizzle this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023
